>
[Mammoth Bow](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1531)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Quest for the Frozen Flame</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #177: Burning Tundra](/Sources.aspx?ID=116) pg. 74</row>

**Price** 2,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 4
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Composite Longbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=74)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This heavy, 12-foot-tall _+2 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [composite longbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=74)_ is fashioned from mammoth tusks lashed together. Due to its great size, you can attack with the _Mammoth Bow_ only if you're Large or larger. The _Mammoth Bow_ deals 2d6 additional piercing damage because of its incredible, magically enhanced draw power. Additionally, the Mammoth Bow has a 180-foot [range increment](/Traits.aspx?ID=248) instead of a 100-foot range increment, but its [volley](/Traits.aspx?ID=201) range increases from 30 feet to 50 feet.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
